Steps.Description: Change the server to the testing server

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that changing the server to the testing server will provide them with access to additional features or lower security measures.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker modifies the server configuration to point to the testing server.
StepDetails.Result: The server is now configured to communicate with the testing server.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that using the default admin credentials will grant them administrative access to the system.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker submits the admin:admin credentials for authorization.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker is granted administrative access to the system.

Steps.Description: Execute the request to get the flag

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that executing the request will provide them with the flag.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker submits the request to retrieve the flag.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully retrieves the flag.
